```Markdown
不使用serving下：
from pprint import pprint
from paddlenlp import Taskflow
ie = Taskflow("information_extraction",model="uie-data-distill-gp", task_path="/home/aistudio/data_distill/checkpoint-mini/model_best") # Schema is fixed in closed-domain information extraction
pprint(ie("格鲁曼FF/SF战斗机，是美国海军装备的第一种可以收放起落架的舰载战斗机，也是格鲁曼战斗机同美国海军结缘70年的开始。"))
[{'武器名称': [{'end': 11,
            'probability': 0.99916863,
            'relations': {'产国': [{'end': 15,
                                  'probability': 0.99942076,
                                  'relations': {},
                                  'start': 13,
                                  'text': '美国'}],
                          '类型': [{'end': 11,
                                  'probability': 0.9989723,
                                  'relations': {},
                                  'start': 8,
                                  'text': '战斗机'}]},
            'start': 0,
            'text': '格鲁曼FF/SF战斗机'}]}]
结果正常：

```

![image](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/assets/34392683/16c063a0-c3fb-4996-ba43-a236b9ebddcd)

使用后就无法预测结果。
为了避免是模型问题测试了，全部未标注文档抽取，serving方式一个都无法抽取，用时0.03s  正常情况为7s左右



### 稳定复现步骤 & 代码

官方给出链接稳定复现：

[https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/blob/develop/applications/information_extraction/text/data_distill](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/blob/develop/applications/information_extraction/text/data_distill)

对了，提醒一下使用非数据蒸馏模型使用serving没有任何问题，码源中client.py有区别分别为：

```
data = {"data": {"text": texts}}

data = {'data': texts}

title: [PPDiffusers] Add reference only
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->
 New features
### PR changes
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->

### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->
新增动态图版本， reference only
依赖：`ppdiffusers>=0.14.1`
### ControlNet Reference Only
[Reference-Only Control](https://github.com/Mikubill/sd-webui-controlnet#reference-only-control) 是一种不需要任何控制模型就可以直接使用图像作为参考来引导生成图像的方法。它使用方式如下所示：

```python
import paddle
from reference_only import ReferenceOnlyPipeline
from ppdiffusers import DDIMScheduler
from ppdiffusers.utils import load_image

pipe = ReferenceOnlyPipeline.from_pretrained("TASUKU2023/Chilloutmix", safety_checker=None, paddle_dtype=paddle.float16)
pipe.scheduler = DDIMScheduler.from_config(pipe.scheduler.config, steps_offset=1, clip_sample=False, set_alpha_to_one=False,)

prompt = "a dog running on grassland, best quality"
input_image = load_image("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Mikubill/sd-webui-controlnet/main/samples/dog_rel.png")

for control_name in ["none", "reference_only", "reference_adain", "reference_adain+attn"]:
    generator = paddle.Generator().manual_seed(42)
    image = pipe(prompt,
                 guidance_scale=7.,
                 height=512,
                 width=512,
                 image=input_image,
                 num_inference_steps=20,
                 generator=generator,
                 control_name=control_name, # "none", "reference_only", "reference_adain", "reference_adain+attn"
                 attention_auto_machine_weight=1.0, # 0.0~1.0
                 gn_auto_machine_weight=1.0, # 0.0~2.0
                 current_style_fidelity=0.5, # 0.0~1.0
                 resize_mode=0, # ["0 means Just resize", "1 means Crop and resize", "2 means Resize and fill", "-1 means Do nothing"]
                ).images[0]
    image.save(control_name + ".png")
```
生成的图片如下所示：


|       none       |       reference_only       |       reference_adain       |       reference_adain+attn       |
|:-------------------:|:-------------------:|:-------------------:|:-------------------:|
|![][none]|![][reference_only]|![][reference_adain]|![][reference_adain+attn]|

[none]: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/assets/50394665/97db3779-9dd7-4d62-ae15-5d2fda68f311
[reference_only]: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/assets/50394665/4d67e752-cddc-40ab-9524-39e8d9b4a428
[reference_adain]: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/assets/50394665/266968c7-5065-4589-9bd8-47515d50c6de
[reference_adain+attn]: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/assets/50394665/73d53a4f-e601-4969-9cb8-e3fdf719ae0c

body:

```
from transformers import SpeechT5Processor, SpeechT5ForSpeechToText
from datasets import load_dataset

dataset = load_dataset("hf-internal-testing/librispeech_asr_demo", "clean", split="validation")
dataset = dataset.sort("id")
sampling_rate = dataset.features["audio"].sampling_rate
example_speech = dataset[0]["audio"]["array"]

processor = SpeechT5Processor.from_pretrained("microsoft/speecht5_asr")
model = SpeechT5ForSpeechToText.from_pretrained("microsoft/speecht5_asr")
model.eval()
# breakpoint()
# print(model.state_dict()["speecht5.encoder.prenet.pos_conv_embed.conv.weight"])
inputs = processor(audio=example_speech, sampling_rate=sampling_rate, return_tensors="pt")
print(inputs)
predicted_ids = model.generate(**inputs, max_length=100)

transcription = processor.batch_decode(predicted_ids, skip_special_tokens=True)
print(transcription[0])
```
result
```
mister quilter is the apostle of the middle classes and we are glad to welcome his gospel
```

+ paddle

```
from paddlenlp.transformers import SpeechT5Processor, SpeechT5ForSpeechToText
from datasets import load_dataset

dataset = load_dataset("hf-internal-testing/librispeech_asr_demo", "clean", split="validation")
dataset = dataset.sort("id")
sampling_rate = dataset.features["audio"].sampling_rate
example_speech = dataset[0]["audio"]["array"]

processor = SpeechT5Processor.from_pretrained("speecht5_asr-pd")
model = SpeechT5ForSpeechToText.from_pretrained("speecht5_asr-pd")
model.eval()
# print(model.state_dict()["speecht5.encoder.prenet.pos_conv_embed.conv.weight"])
inputs = processor(audio=example_speech, sampling_rate=sampling_rate, return_tensors="pd")
predicted_ids, scores = model.generate(**inputs, max_length=100,return_dict=True)
transcription = processor.batch_decode(predicted_ids, skip_special_tokens=True)
print(transcription[0])
```
result:

```
mister quilter is the apostle of the middle classes and we are glad to welcome his gospel
```

title: [Question]: 运行文档智能doc_vqa案例时，出现异常`TypeError: __init__() missing 1 required positional argument: 'num_classes'`
body:
### 请提出你的问题

[Question]: 运行文档智能doc_vqa案例时，出现异常`TypeError: __init__() missing 1 required positional argument: 'num_classes'`

![image](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/assets/34825635/501b423f-512c-434b-bbc5-4a206aecc660)

## 问题说明
按照[教程](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/tree/develop/applications/document_intelligence/doc_vqa)，运行到**6. 跨模态阅读理解模块**时，按说明下载了预训练模型，然后运行脚本`bash run_train.sh`时出错。

* 检查了下载下来的base模型，发现config.json文件中缺少`num_classes`这个参数，手动添加了`num_classes:4`，然后尝试运行脚本依然报错，查看日志，打印的LayoutXLMConfig中，依然没有num_classes
![image](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/assets/34825635/ce24e705-e740-4b7a-b4d9-83822d60f4e9)

* 考虑到应该是实例化模型时传参出错，尝试直接设置默认值

![image](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/assets/34825635/5d2874a9-9616-4b1d-af88-f2d5282a0961)

然后出现了新的异常

![image](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/assets/34825635/f9cc0caf-5f30-4734-b9ff-41c8587524ad)

### 稳定复现步骤 & 代码

自定义模型，用ernielayout预测表格中字符的行列label，定义模型如下：
```python
class MyModel(ErnieLayoutPretrainedModel):
    def __init__(self, config: ErnieLayoutConfig, row_cls_num=100,  col_cls_num=100):
        super(MyModel, self).__init__(config)
        self.row_classifier = nn.Linear(768, row_cls_num)
        self.col_classifier = nn.Linear(768, col_cls_num)
        self.ernie_layout = ErnieLayoutModel(config)
        self.softmax = nn.Softmax(axis=2)

    def forward(self, input_ids, token_type_ids=None, position_ids=None, attention_mask=None, bbox=None, image=None):
        sequence_output, _ = self.ernie_layout(
            input_ids=input_ids,
            token_type_ids=token_type_ids,
            position_ids=position_ids,
            attention_mask=attention_mask,
            bbox=bbox,
            image=image,
        )
        seq_length = paddle.shape(input_ids)[1]
        sequence_output = sequence_output[:, :seq_length]
        row_logits = self.row_classifier(sequence_output)
        # row_prob = self.softmax(row_logits)

        col_logits = self.col_classifier(sequence_output)
        # col_prob = self.softmax(col_logits)
        return row_logits, col_logits
```

训练代码如下：
```python
    for epoch_id in range(EPOCH_NUM):
        for batch_id, (inputs, row_label, col_label) in enumerate(train_loader()):
            print(batch_id)

            # try:
            global_steps += 1
            # if global_steps < 253:
            #     continue
            row_logits, col_logits = model(**inputs)
            row_label = row_label.reshape((-1,))
            row_logits = row_logits.reshape((-1, 100))
            col_label = col_label.reshape((-1,))
            col_logits = col_logits.reshape((-1, 100))
            # print(row_label, col_label)
            loss1 = loss_fn1(row_logits, row_label, ignore_index=1000)
            loss2 = loss_fn2(col_logits, col_label, ignore_index=1000)
            loss = (loss1 + loss2) * 0.5
```
collate_fn定义如下：
```python
    input_ids = paddle.stack([paddle.to_tensor(b['input_ids']) for b in batch]).astype(paddle.int64)
    token_type_ids = paddle.stack([paddle.to_tensor(b['token_type_ids']) for b in batch]).astype(paddle.int64)
    position_ids = paddle.stack([paddle.to_tensor(b['position_ids']) for b in batch]).astype(paddle.int64)
    attention_mask = paddle.stack([paddle.to_tensor(b['attention_mask']) for b in batch]).astype(paddle.int64)
    bbox = paddle.stack([paddle.to_tensor(b['bbox']) for b in batch]).astype(paddle.int64)
    image = paddle.stack([paddle.to_tensor(b['image']) for b in batch]).astype(paddle.float32)
    rows = paddle.stack([paddle.to_tensor(b['rows']) for b in batch]).astype(paddle.int64)
    cols = paddle.stack([paddle.to_tensor(b['cols']) for b in batch]).astype(paddle.int64)
```
经多次试验，发现是bbox会影响（个人认为主要这个因素，不排除其他因素）。当固定使用bbox如下时：
```python
import random
m = 7
b = [random.randint(0,m),random.randint(0,m),random.randint(0,m),random.randint(0,m)]
box = [b]*512 # 造的数据
bbox = paddle.stack([paddle.to_tensor(box) for b in batch]).astype(paddle.int64)
```
当m=0时可以长时间运行，当m取5-1000时，极容易报cuda错误。请问如何解决？在小数据集（30多样本）上没有什么问题，在PubTabNe中选择30000多样本，极其容易报错。最好的是最初能够跑完一个epoch，但是后面就经常报cuda错误。paddle.io.DataLoader中的shuffle为False，每次报错不是固定在某个样本。急救啊！

body: ### PR types New features ### PR changes Models ### Description 1. Add MiniGPT4 model 2. Add tests for MiniGPT4 You can use MiniGPT4 as follows: ```python import os os.environ["CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES"]="0" os.environ["FLAGS_use_cuda_managed_memory"]="true" import requests from PIL import Image import paddle from paddlenlp.transformers import MiniGPT4ForConditionalGeneration, MiniGPT4Processor # load MiniGPT4 moel and processor minigpt4_7b_path = "ckpt_path" model = MiniGPT4ForConditionalGeneration.from_pretrained(minigpt4_7b_path) model.eval() processor = MiniGPT4Processor.from_pretrained(minigpt4_7b_path) print("load processor and model done!") # prepare model inputs for MiniGPT4 url = "https://paddlenlp.bj.bcebos.com/data/images/mugs.png" image = Image.open(requests.get(url, stream=True).raw) text = "describe this image" prompt = "Give the following image: ImageContent. You will be able to see the image once I provide it to you. Please answer my questions.###Human: ###Assistant:" inputs = processor(image, text, prompt) # generate with MiniGPT4 generate_kwargs = {"max_length":300, "num_beams":1, "top_p":1.0, "repetition_penalty": 1.0, "length_penalty":0, "temperature":1, "decode_strategy":"greedy_search", "eos_token_id":[[835], [2277, 29937]]} outputs = model.generate(**inputs, **generate_kwargs) msg = processor.batch_decode(outputs[0]) print(msg) ``` ```text ['The image shows two mugs with cats on them, one is black and white and the other is blue and white. The mugs are sitting on a table with a book in the background. The mugs have a whimsical, cartoon-like appearance. The cats on the mugs are looking at each other with a playful expression. The overall mood of the image is lighthearted and fun.###'] ```

title: [Question]: FasterBART转静态图再用FasterTransformer加载后使用Beam Search推理的Beam size有问题
body:
### 请提出你的问题

bug描述 Describe the Bug
使用下面代码将BART转化为静态图：

    model = BartForConditionalGeneration.from_pretrained(args.model_name_or_path)
    #tokenizer = BertTokenizer.from_pretrained('uer/bart-base-chinese-cluecorpussmall')

    # For opening faster_encoder
    model.eval()

    faster_bart = FasterBART(model=model,
                             use_fp16_decoding=args.use_fp16_decoding)
    # Set evaluate mode
    faster_bart.eval()

    # Convert dygraph model to static graph model
    faster_bart = paddle.jit.to_static(
        faster_bart,
        input_spec=[
            # input_ids
            paddle.static.InputSpec(shape=[None, None], dtype="int32"),
            # encoder_output
            None,
            # seq_len
            None,
            5,  # num_beams.
            args.topk,
            args.topp,
            args.decoding_strategy,
            101, #tokenizer.bos_token_id,  # bos
            102,  # eos 
            0, #tokenizer.pad_token_id,  # pad 
            102, #tokenizer.eos_token_id,  # decoder_start_token_id
            args.max_out_len,  # max_length
            args.diversity_rate,  # diversity_rate
            args.length_penalty,  # length_penalty
            args.num_return_sequences,
            args.early_stopping,
            0,  #forced_eos_token_id
        ])

    # Save converted static graph model
    paddle.jit.save(faster_bart, os.path.join(args.inference_model_dir, "bart")
然后用FasterTransformer加载及预测：

def infer(args):
    model_path = '../base_checkpoint/'
    tokenizer = BertTokenizer.from_pretrained(model_path)

    sentences = [
        "I love that girl, but <mask> does not <mask> me.",
        "She is so <mask> that I can not help glance at <mask>.",
        "Nothing's gonna <mask> my love for you.",
        "Drop everything now. Meet me in the pouring <mask>. Kiss me on the sidewalk.",
    ]

    input_ids = prepare_input(tokenizer, sentences)

    # Load FasterTransformer lib.
    # load("FasterTransformer", build_dir='infer_model_ids', verbose=True)
    load("FasterTransformer", build_dir=args.inference_model_dir, verbose=True)

    config = paddle_infer.Config(
        os.path.join(args.inference_model_dir, "bart.pdmodel"),
        os.path.join(args.inference_model_dir, "bart.pdiparams"))

    config.enable_use_gpu(100, 0)
    config.disable_glog_info()
    config.delete_pass("embedding_eltwise_layernorm_fuse_pass")
    predictor = paddle_infer.create_predictor(config)

    input_names = predictor.get_input_names()
    input_handle = predictor.get_input_handle(input_names[0])
    input_handle.copy_from_cpu(input_ids.astype("int32"))

    predictor.run()

    output_names = predictor.get_output_names()
    output_handle = predictor.get_output_handle(output_names[0])
    output_data = output_handle.copy_to_cpu()

    output_data = output_data.transpose((1, 2, 0))
    print(output_data.shape) #! 这里的size是(4, 10, 22)

    results = []
    for idx, sample in enumerate(output_data):
        # generation = tokenizer.batch_decode(sample[0][np.newaxis, :], skip_special_tokens=True)
        generation = tokenizer.batch_decode(sample, skip_special_tokens=True)
        
        pprint(generation)
        results.append(generation[0])
    # """
打印output_data的size为(4, 10, 22)，但是转静态图时设置的beam size为5，相当于beam size翻倍了，我又尝试在转静态图时将beam sisze设置为1，然后再用FasterTransformer加载并预测后，输出的beam size就是2

title: [Question]: 为什么vocab.txt里会有两个相同的字符？
body:
### 请提出你的问题

我从/paddlenlp/transformers/ernie/tokenizer.py的154行提取了vocab.txt的下载地址：
[https://bj.bcebos.com/paddlenlp/models/transformers/ernie_3.0/ernie_3.0_nano_zh_vocab.txt](url)
我发现这个文件的12085行和18006行存在相同的字符“$“。为什么会出现这种情况？
这会对huggingface transformers库的tokenizer产生影响。由于vocab.txt存在相同的字符，tokenizer会丢失token id：12084，且在新增special token时，新增的special token将无法被赋予正确的新id（实际上会产生与最后一个字符[UNK]相同的id）。

title: UIE 模型版本请教
body:
### 问题描述

Yaojie Lu等人在ACL-2022 的论文中提出了通用信息抽取统一框架UIE，在这篇论文中，UIE的训练是先用 T5-v1.1-base 和T5-v1.1-large 初始化模型，然后用论文中提到的三种类型的数据集进行进一步的预训练，最后在下游特定任务上进行微调使用；

而在`PaddleNLP/model_zoo/uie` 里，则是这样描述的：
PaddleNLP借鉴该论文的方法，基于ERNIE 3.0知识增强预训练模型，训练并开源了首个中文通用信息抽取模型UIE。
但是PaddleNLP具体是怎么借鉴的，怎么训练的等等细节并没有提到，关于训练相关的细节能不能详细解释一下；
我能不能这样理解：只是把初始化模型更换成了ERNIE 3.0知识增强预训练模型，其他的都和原论文里一样？

Agent few-shot-react started with {'query': 'Which author is English: John Braine or Studs Terkel?', 'params': None}

Let's think step by step. To answer this question, we first need to know the name of the author.

Tool: Search

 Observation: John Braine
Thought: We've learned the name of the author is John Braine. Now, we need to find out if John Braine is an English author.

Tool: Search

def forward(self, sentence, lengths,labels = None):  # dont confuse this with _forward_alg above.
        # Get the emission scores from the BiLSTM
        lstm_feats = self._get_lstm_features(sentence)
        print(lstm_feats)
        if labels is not None:
            loss = self.crf_loss(lstm_feats, lengths, labels)
            return loss
        else:
            _, prediction = self.viterbi_decoder(lstm_feats, lengths)
            return prediction

```

模型定义
```python
def __init__(self, vocab_size, tag_to_ix, embedding_dim, hidden_dim):
      
        super(BiLSTM_CRF, self).__init__()
        
        self.embedding_dim = embedding_dim
        self.hidden_dim = hidden_dim
        self.vocab_size = vocab_size
        self.tag_to_ix = tag_to_ix
        self.tagset_size = len(tag_to_ix)
        self.word_embeds = paddle.nn.Embedding(vocab_size, embedding_dim)
        self.bilstm = paddle.nn.LSTM(embedding_dim, hidden_dim // 2,
                            num_layers=2, direction='bidirectional')
       
        self.hidden2tag = paddle.nn.Linear(hidden_dim, self.tagset_size + 2)# start, stop

        self.crf = LinearChainCrf(self.tagset_size, crf_lr=0.1)
        self.crf_loss = LinearChainCrfLoss(self.crf)
        self._viterbi_decode = ViterbiDecoder(self.crf.transitions,False)
      

        self.hidden = self.init_hidden()
